name: Guinea Pig Wooden Hideout with Built-in Feeder, Screw-Assembled Natural Wood Castle with Absorbent Fleece Mat, Ramp & Accessories, Cozy Safe Hideaway for Small Pets to Rest, Play & Explore
short_description: Screw-Assembled Natural Wood: The guinea pig hideout is designed for simple, secure assembly using natural, pet-safe wood and pre-drilled, screw-fastened planks. Comes with assembly instructions, screwdriver, and all necessary hardware for quick and easy setup. Ensures a sturdy and safe structure for daily use. Works as a rabbit hideout, chinchilla stand, or guinea pig house, and even doubles as a wooden guinea pig bed for resting.

Soft and Absorbent Fleece Mat: Includes a premium fleece mat that is super soft and absorbent, providing a warm, cushioned surface for your small animals. Reversible design: one side white, the other with an adorable pattern. The mat helps maintain a clean environment by absorbing moisture and is easy to remove and wash, ensuring your pets enjoy a cozy, hygienic hideout every day. Perfect for pairing with other guinea pig huts or accessories for maximum comfort.

Built-in Feeder: This guinea pig wooden hideout features a practical built-in feeder, eliminating the need for extra bowls and reducing mess inside your pet's habitat. Designed for convenience, it keeps food in place and easily accessible, making it a neat and functional guinea pig hideout or rabbit hideout. Perfect for owners who want to create a complete guinea pig playground with smart feeding solutions.

Fun Platform with Anti-Slip: Designed to entertain and engage, this small animal hideout includes a secure wooden platform with anti-slip surface, creating a fun guinea pig loft for lounging, feeding, or playing. Encourages climbing, exploration, and exercise, helping relieve boredom and support healthy activity. Ideal as part of a guinea pig playground or as multifunctional small pet furniture.

Spacious and Versatile for Small Pets: Measuring 15" x 10" x 7", this hideout is ideal for multiple guinea pigs or other small animals to use at the same time, including rabbits, chinchillas, hamsters, mice, and hedgehogs. Multiple access points, cozy interior spaces, and a top platform make it a fun toy, hideaway, and stylish piece of furniture that fits seamlessly into any small animal playground.
